column2:
<!-- rnb-source-begin  -->

```r
# ar coefficient
phi = c(rep(0, 11), 0.9)

# simulate as regular arima
sAR = arima.sim(list(order = c(12,0, 0), ar = phi), n = 37)


# change frequency
sAR = ts(sAR, freq = 12)
par(mar = c(3, 3, 2, 1), mgp = c(1.6, 0.6, 0))
plot(sAR, axes = FALSE, main = \Seasonal AR(1)\"

```r
# ar coefficient
phi = c(rep(0, 11), 0.9)

# simulate as regular arima
sAR = arima.sim(list(order = c(12,0, 0), ar = phi), n = 37)


# change frequency
sAR = ts(sAR, freq = 12)
par(mar = c(3, 3, 2, 1), mgp = c(1.6, 0.6, 0))
plot(sAR, axes = FALSE, main = \Seasonal AR(1)\"
